title: How to Wash Your Hair After Getting a Perm

steps.title: Wait at least 3 days to wash newly permed hair, or your perm will not last as long.
steps.content: Wait at least 3 days to wash newly permed hair, or your perm will not last as long.

steps.title: Use hair care products that are safe for permed hair .
steps.content: Use hair care products that are safe for permed hair .

steps.title: Wash your hair gently (don't scrub too hard or your hair will tangle up)(your hair is very porous and fragile).
steps.content: Wash your hair gently (don't scrub too hard or your hair will tangle up)(your hair is very porous and fragile). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Apply conditioner to your hair (Conditioner will help you reduce the damage to your hair).
steps.content: Apply conditioner to your hair (Conditioner will help you reduce the damage to your hair). [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use a wide tooth comb to untangle your hair) (start at the bottom and work your way to the top to reduce breakage to a minimum).
steps.content: Use a wide tooth comb to untangle your hair) (start at the bottom and work your way to the top to reduce breakage to a minimum).

steps.title: Once a week use a deep conditioner, (follow instructions on the back).
steps.content: Once a week use a deep conditioner, (follow instructions on the back).
